presentation.presentation2: And I'am a front-end developer and I love what I do!

whatIDoCards.title: Websites
whatIDoCards.extra: I develop responsive and fast web pages.

whatIDoCards.title: Mobile
whatIDoCards.extra: I develop mobile applications, from the creation stage to publication.

whatIDoCards.title: SEO
whatIDoCards.extra: I take care of and optimize the website’s indexing in search engines.

whoIAm.title: Welcome!
whoIAm.subtitle: A little about me . . .
whoIAm.infoAboutMe: I graduated from the Faculdade de Tecnologia de Ribeirão Preto (FATEC - RP) and from the beginning I fell in love with Front-End. So I studied and learned until I got my first job. So, today, I have several experiences in different technologies focused on this area and I continue to want to improve them.

timeline.title: Software Developer trainee
timeline.subtitle: Skills: React Native, Redux, Sagas, .NET Core.
timeline.description: Monitoring and beginning studies to create an application using React Native focused on selling tickets and products for shows and nightclubs

timeline.title: Junior Software Developer
timeline.subtitle: Skills: Flutter, .NET Core.
timeline.description: Development of an application using Flutter for Tennis competitions.

timeline.title: Junior Software Developer
timeline.subtitle: Skills: React, Redux, Sagas, NextJS and Storybooks
timeline.description: Development of systems for city halls, initially maintaining an old system. Creation of a new pattern and websites using NextJS with Storybooks.

timeline.title: Mid Software Developer
timeline.subtitle: Skills: Angular and .NET Core
timeline.description: Development and maintenance of a website for brokerage and market management.

timeline.title: Mid Software Developer
timeline.subtitle: Skills: NextJS, React, Flutter and React Native.
timeline.description: Expertise in internal company projects, developing the company's new website using NextJS. Application maintenance using React Native and creation of a new photo application using Flutter.

skills.title: My Skills & Experience
skills.subtitle: My main focus is front-end development (mobile and web).
skills.description: Landing Pages, components, librarys, mobile applications and plugins. I have experience in FullStack using .Net Core and Node.
